Works for me. Which zip file did you install?

(In reply to comment #2)
> Im using cdt build 200504140301:
> 
> org.eclipse.cdt-3.0.0-M6-linux.x86.tar.gz
> org.eclipse.cdt.sdk-3.0.0-M6-linux.x86.tar.gz

In Run -> Run, try to uncheck the "Connect process input & output to a terminal". Has worked for me.
